attributes.action: make all pubs and nightclubs accept the pass cards as id and to sign up for the pass scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like all pubs and nightclubs in the uk accept the pass cards as id.
and all pubs and nightclubs to sign up for the pass scheme and for the pass cards to be widely recognised in the uk in every pub and nightclub.
